body.name: ADORNEVE Queen Bed Frame with Drawers, LED Bed Frame with 2 USB Charging Station, Upholstered Platform Bed with Storage & LED Lights Headboard, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Dark Grey
features: 【Modern Fashion Style】-Attached with Led Light , this upholstered bed frame provide stylish modern style in a glamorous way. Upholstered in skin-friendly, breathable, and wear-resistant linen fabric which provides comfortable support for reading or lounging in bed.

【Led Bed Frame with USB Power Strips】- Upholstered Bed frame features a show-stopping Smart LED light headboard for some futuristic vibes.Multifunctional LED light strips,beautiful Multi-colour RGB LED Light(There are over 60000 colors to choose from), Phone App +Remote Control multiple control modes. You can freely set the brightness,color,mode and timing function,and design your light show to your heart's content. with RGB LED Lights Beds Makes Your Life Smarter, more suitable for your needs.

【Practical Storage Bed】-The 4 storage drawers are perfect for organizing clothing, storing quilts, pillows, clothes and sheets.In addition, the bottom of the drawer has a backing plate, which can prevent items from falling and dust entering. they slide in and out so easily you can easily store your household items. it adds a lot of storage space to our bedroom.

【Stable and Durable】-With durable wooden slat design, the platform bed with led lights can support up to 880lbs and allow air to flow freely under the bed. It keeps your mattress fresh without the need for box spring. high-quality hardware ensures bed frame stability and no noise.

【Easy Assembly & Only 1 Box】 -Each part of the bed full is clearly labeled and numbered on each and you just need to match those numbers in order to assemble. Bed in a box, don’t have to worry or wait for the second box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is great! Easy to assemble, though it took me a few hours by myself. Great value for the money! Good materials and the LED lights are pretty cool as well! Sturdy and would definitely work on carpet (I have vinyl flooring) as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We Love It!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I brought this bed frame for my 16 year old son who is almost 6 feet tall. It’s sturdy and looks great! I had to contact the manufacturer for something minor and they responded almost immediately which I really appreciated. Oh and they also have a video showing step by step instructions on putting the bed together which helped me so much more than the paper instructions. Do not let putting the drawers together frustrate you! I promise once u get one of them together the other 3 are super easy and your like ohhhhhhhhhh yeah I get it 😂.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks like the picture
reviews.reviewText: My Son is very happy with it. The quality is good, looks like the pictures. The LED strip didn't last very long and needs to be replaced. Fell down pretty soon after we set up the bed. The remote is nice to change the color every night and a timer so it goes off after the kids fall asleep. The drawers are kind of a pain in the butt to but together. Items tend to fall through the grates but over all work well. The overall product is worth the money and looks like an expensive bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together…
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this bed!!! It was delivered while I was working & so easy to put together, my 15yo son did it to surprise me when I came home! I love all the extra storage underneath, the LED lights & being able to charge my phone while I sleep. It feels luxurious & expensive with the upholstery, I feel like a queen sleeping in it!!! I would definitely buy it again and one of my girlfriends asked for the link because she’s buying one for herself. 5 stars for sure, super satisfied customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Solid bed frame
reviews.reviewText: The bed looks really nice just the pull out drawers are a bit flimsy and doesn’t have a track to sit in, the bed frame assembly was easy and only took about 45mins but the pull out drawers took about an hour to assemble and the clips they use are annoying to use but overall a solid bedLed lights are a nice touch they just need a better way to secure them the ones in my sons room fell off already

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very smooth setup, looks very nice
reviews.reviewText: I got this for the guest bedroom. I think it was easy to put together, is sturdy, and I love the storage. I wish they would use a magnetic feature for closing the drawers, and even a rail system that would stabilize the drawers, but I guess you get what you pay for. It is stylish, easy to assemble and very nice upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If your trying to save space def worth it!
reviews.reviewText: My son has a lot going on in his room as it is and I wanted to save space by having a full bed with some drawers and this bed is perfect!Love how it doesn’t look like there are any drawers. The bed and drawers are pretty sturdy. The led lights and controls worked perfectly.Heads up it was pretty easy to put the bed together I would recommend at least two people.. the drawers were the hardest part out of the assembly but overall the purchase was absolutely worth it I would highly recommend to others
